definition: to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: VSO will obtain your consent before contacting referees.
sentences.chinese: 在联络你的联系人之前我们会征得你的同意。

sentences.english: She needs to ask for the squad leader’s permission when she wants to go to the washroom.
sentences.chinese: 就连去洗手间，她都需要事先征得班长的同意。

sentences.english: I ought first to have asked your consent.
sentences.chinese: 我本应该首先征得你的同意。

sentences.english: With her consent, you can also kiss her.
sentences.chinese: 征得她的同意后，你还能吻她的唇。

sentences.english: And question number three, the basic idea of consent. Kathleen got us on to this.
sentences.chinese: 至于问题三，就是征得同意的观点，凯思琳提到的。

sentences.english: Ge, we are honoured to have it published here first.
sentences.chinese: 现征得先生同意，惠允首先在本刊发表。

sentences.english: I'd rather she had asked me before borrowing the car.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望她在借车之前先征得我的同意。

sentences.english: You could not cancel the contract lacking Number1 securing we agreement.
sentences.chinese: 假如没有事先征得咱们同意，你们无所不能停止合同。
非常有趣，好的，征得同意。

sentences.english: These photos were reproduced by courtesy of the General Electric Company.
sentences.chinese: 这些相片是征得“通用电气公司”的许可而翻印的。

sentences.english: You cannot cancel the contrair conditioning unitt without first securing our conformity.
sentences.chinese: 倘使没有事前征得我们答允，你们不能取消合同。

sentences.english: You must ask the minders' permission before taking any photo, although most visitors end up taking hundreds of photos anyway.
sentences.chinese: 在拍照前，你必须征得官方导游的同意。

sentences.english: Ask permission to bring your friends to your homestay.
sentences.chinese: 请朋友来访需先征得住宿家庭的同意。

sentences.english: You can't cancel the contract without first securing our agreement.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有实现征得我们同意，你们不能取消合同。

sentences.english: The handle of backing must be agreed with Buyer prior to production .
sentences.chinese: 衬布手感必须在生产大货前征得买手同意。

definition: to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to give a nod of approval
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
not having undergone/without (having gone though a certain process)
